review.title: “Routing Administration Leader/Project Coordinator”
review.pros: Pros – - It is a good choice for who are interested to join Medical Informatics career.- It is an outsourcing process that gets money from abroad to Egypt.- International/Regional work experience.
review.cons: Cons – - It is indoor work, that is not a good choice for who are interested in outdoor work.- This technology is not yet widely indulged in Egyptian market, so it depends on outsourcing from abroad, that in turn may widely be massively affected by markets abroad.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Renew the marketing plan to get more clients abroad and here in Egypt.- Promotion protocol should be modified.
